title: M4 Forecasting Competition Sampled Monthly Series - 50 Percent
description: This is a variation of the M4 Forecasting Competition Sampled Monthly Seriesdataset. In this variation, 50% of the latest epochs from the original timeseries are retained. This dataset comprises 80 timeseries at monthly frequency, each spanning 324 months, randomly sampled from the M4 forecasting competition. These series provide a consistent length of historical window and are ideal for exploring long-term trends and seasonalities. The M4 dataset contains series drawn from across various sectors.

timeField.name: month
timeField.description: Date representing first day of the month of measurement.
